contents: Recently, lots of RABID squirrels have INVADED from the east and are trying to ATTACK peaceful,
innocent pigeons. You surely understand, as a pigeon.
Please send in the winged military to STOP them AT ONCE.

option tags.y: send the pigeon military to stop supposed squirrel attacks

contents: You send in the military and they remove some squirrels.
The squirrels are greatly disturbed by this unwarranted use of state violence, as are many pigeons...
The squirrels are pleased you are not provoked by the claims made by a single pigeon, as are many pigeons.
